
Excercise 1
var myString = "Jason";
var myNumber = 60123;
var myBoolean = true;

Excercise 2
// Do not edit the code under this line
console.log("Name:Jason " + myString);
console.log("Lucky Number:20 " + myNumber);
console.log("Good joke? true" + myBoolean);

Excercise 3
console.log(' cheese', 'meatball');

Excercise 4
console.log(3.5+20);
console.log(2016-1969);
console.log(65/240);
console.log(0.27083333333333333333*100);

Excercise 5
console.log(365/27);
console.log(365%27);

Excercise 6
console.log(Math.random() * 100);
console.log(Math.floor(Math.random() * 100 ));


Excercise 7
// openiing line
console.log('It was love at first sight.');
